channel.title: SoftLayer_Provisioning_Maintenance_Window on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Provisioning_Maintenance_Window
item.description: SoftLayer_Provisioning_Maintenance_Window Service Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Provisioning_Maintenance_Window represent a time window that SoftLayer performs a hardware or software maintenance and upgrades. Local beginDate The date and time a maintenance window is scheduled to begin. Type: dateTime dayOfWeek An ISO-8601 numeric representation of the day of the week that a maintenance window is performed. 1: Monday, 7: Sunday Type: integer endDate The date and time a maintenance window is scheduled to end.
